verse.arabic: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
verse.transliteration: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqi waalmagharibi inna laqadiroona

root.meaning: to refuse, to deny, to be incapable

words.meaning: I swear; I make an oath

root.meaning: to divide, apportion, distribute; to share out; to decree or assign a portion

components.meaning: prefix indicating the first person singular active voice (I)
the verb root meaning to swear, oath (derived from the root ق-س-م)

root.meaning: to have power, to possess, to control; Lord

words.meaning: The risings; the places of sunrise

root.meaning: to rise; to begin (often of the sun)

components.meaning: risings; places of sunrise (plural of mashriq)

words.meaning: And the settings; and the places of sunset

root.meaning: to set (sun), to go down, to hide; west

components.meaning: settings (of the sun), places of sunset (plural)

words.meaning: Truly able; We are certainly capable

root.meaning: to be powerful, to have power or ability; to estimate, measure, appreciate

components.meaning: The emphatic particle 'la' - used for emphasis, meaning 'truly', 'indeed'

literalTranslation.wordAligned: So-then not I-swear By-Lord-of the-risings And-the-settings Indeed We Truly-able

metadata.scope: no tafsīr, thematic, or theological interpretation
